covered_topics: conditional statement, loops, arrays, function etc
examples: Write a JavaScript program that accept two integers and display the larger.
Write a JavaScript conditional statement to find the sign of product of three numbers. Display an alert box with the specified sign.
Write a JavaScript conditional statement to sort three numbers. Display an alert box to show the result.
Write a JavaScript program to construct the following pattern, using a nested for loop.
Write a JavaScript program to compute the greatest common divisor (GCD) of two positive integers.
Write a JavaScript function to check whether an `input` is an array or not.
Write a JavaScript function to clone an array.
Write a simple JavaScript program to join all elements of the following array into a string.
Write a JavaScript function to find the highest value in an array.
Write a JavaScript function to check whether an `input` is a string or not.

covered_topics: Date and Time, arrays, String etc
examples: Write a Java program to create a Date object using the Calendar class.
Write a Java program to get current full date and time.
Write a Java program to get a day of the week of a specific date.
Write a Java program to check a year is a leap year or not.
Write a Java program to sort a numeric array and a string array.
Write a Java program to remove a specific element from an array.
Write a Java program to find the maximum and minimum value of an array.
rite a Java program to find the common elements between two arrays of integers.
Write a Java program to get the character (Unicode code point) before the specified index within the String.
Write a C program to create, initialize and use pointers.
Write a C program to add two numbers using pointers.
Write a C program to access two dimensional array using pointers.
Write a C program to add two matrices.
Write a C program to perform Scalar matrix multiplication.
Write a C program to find sum of upper triangular matrix.
Write a C program to read numbers from a file and write even, odd and prime numbers to separate file.
Write a C program to count characters, words and lines in a text file.
Write a C program to replace specific line in a text file.
Write a C program to count occurrences of all words in a text file.
Bitwise operator programming exercises and solutions in C.
Write a C++ program that returns the elements in a vector that are strictly smaller than their adjacent left and right neighbours.
Write a C++ program to capitalize the first character of each element of a given string vector. Return the new vector.
Write a C++ program to verify that all of the letters in the second string appear in the first string as well. Return true otherwise false
Write a C++ program to create an n x n matrix by taking an integer (n) as input from the user.
Write a C++ program to create and display a Singly Linked List.
Write a C++ program to insert a new node at the beginning of a Singly Linked List.
Write a C++ program to find the middle element of a given Linked List.
Write a C++ program to delete the last node of a Singly Linked List.
Write a C++ program to create a doubly linked list of n nodes and display it in reverse order.
Write a program in C++ to check whether a given number is an ugly number or not.
Write a program in C++ to find the Abundant numbers (integers) between 1 to 1000.
Write a C++ program to sort an array of positive integers using the Bead sort algorithm.
